mapper.insert:
insert into review(store_no, user_no, reg_date, review_ratio, image_list, content, is_answered, answer_content, answer_date, user_name) VALUES
( #{item.store_no}, #{item.user_no}, #{item.reg_date}, #{item.review_ratio}, #{item.image_list}, #{item.content}, #{item.is_answered}, #{item.answer_content}, #{item.answer_date}, #{item.user_name} )
mapper.select: select review_no, user_name, content, image_list, answer_content, reg_date, answer_date, answer_content, review_ratio, is_answered from review WHERE store_no = #{store_no}
mapper.update: update review SET answer_content=#{answer_content}, answer_date=#{answer_date}, is_answered= true WHERE review_no = #{review_no}
